featured.text: Red imported fire ants build mounds in any type of soil.
The red ant does not build mounds inside the house.
Each nest used to have but one queen, but now many mounds are often found with multiple queens.
They also like to make their mounds in sunny areas, heavily infesting lawns and pastures.

definition.zh_def: 小丘，土堆或其他物質的堆積，通常呈圓形或橢圓形。
definition.en_def: A raised area or pile, often made of earth or other materials, typically rounded or oval in shape.
definition.example: The children built a mound of sand at the beach.
